name: Add to Quote For Woocommerce
author: Gravity Master

sections.description:
Add to Quote For Woocommerce is a powerful tool designed to enhance the functionality of your WooCommerce store by enabling customers to request quotes for products instead of making immediate purchases. With this plugin, customers can add products to a quote cart, review their selections, and submit a quote request for a personalized price or more information.

FEATURES

  • Enable/Disable
  • Customize Enquiry Cart Button Label
  • Enquiry Cart Display Page Shop and Single Product Page, Single Product Page, Custom Location
  • Shortcode : `[gmpqcw_enquiry_single_product]` or `[gmpqcw_enquiry_single_product id='{product_id}’]`
  • For setup cart page you need to put shortcode in page `[gm_woo_enquiry_cart]`
  • All Quote list can be show and download with csv
  • show button for logged or logged out
  • Show Enquiry Button When Product is out of stock
  • Remove Price From Product
  • Hide Add to Cart Button
  • Customize Button Color
  • Redirect after submission
  • Disable Woocommerce Cart and Checkout Page
  • Include Exclude Base On Category
  • Add custom field on enquiry form (text, select, checkbox, textarea, radio)
  • Email customizer
  • Translate

What is a Product Quote Cart?

In the world of e-commerce, providing an exceptional shopping experience is paramount to success. One way to elevate customer satisfaction and increase sales is by offering a seamless and efficient quoting process. For WooCommerce-powered online stores, implementing a Product Quote Cart can be a game-changer.
